revision.comment: Created page with "{{Infobox battle item |name = Wonder Chest |image = [[File:Wonder Chest.png|100px]] |caption = In game image of the ''Wonder Chest'' |price = 15,000 {{pdollar}} |location = [[Shops]] }} ==Description== The '''Wonder Chest''' is a type of [[Held Items|Held Item]] that can be equipped to any Pokémon. ==Details== Raises the Exp agin of the Pokémon holding the Item by 15%. ==Acquistion== {{ItemPrice/head‎|Battle items}} {{ItemPrice|Shops#Johto..."
